name: Eating Sim LD42 Edition
description:
Compete in a realistic speed eating competition.

Chomp food to bits and send it to your stomach to be broken down into calories and protein.  Drain your stomach to collect the nutrients & score points!

Features 4 types of foods that react to the body in unique ways. Burp and vomit to clear you esophagus and keep going!

There's a single player high score mode, and a local versus mode where you share a keyboard with another player.
